narrative.title: A reliability arc tailored for heavy industry
narrative.description: When operations face volatility, Primac provides a disciplined arc that moves teams from uncertainty to reliable performance.

items.title: Operations Face Uncertainty
items.description: Industrial environments evolve rapidly. Load profiles shift, production targets change, and unexpected failures cascade into costly downtime.

image.alt: Operations team observing refinery equipment at dusk.

items.title: Assets Degrade Under Pressure
items.description: Bearings, gearboxes, and rotating equipment slowly drift out of spec. Degradation begins long before alarms trip.

image.alt: Gas turbine rotor with maintenance access open.

items.title: A Trusted Guide Enters
items.description: Primac brings decades of field experience, disciplined diagnostics, and clear communication into high-stakes environments.

image.alt: Condition monitoring specialist setting up vibration sensors.

items.title: You Become the Hero
items.description: With actionable insights and calm guidance, your team regains control, avoids emergencies, and plans with confidence.

image.alt: Maintenance lead reviewing data beside illuminated equipment.

items.title: The Outcome: Operational Resilience
items.description: Failures drop. Predictability rises. Maintenance becomes strategic instead of reactive.

image.alt: Well-maintained plant equipment under balanced lighting.

differentiators.title: Field discipline backed by measurable outcomes
differentiators.description: We combine seasoned analysts, proven methods, and calm judgement to keep critical assets running when they matter most.

items.title: Experienced, Field-Proven Team
items.description: Senior analysts with decades in mills, mines, refineries, terminals, and utilities.

items.title: Presence & Steadiness Under Pressure
items.description: Calm judgement during critical outages and high-production events.

supportingImage.alt: Engineer coordinating response during a night shift.

items.title: Right Technology, Applied Wisely
items.description: Tools only matter when paired with domain expertise and correct interpretation.

supportingImage.alt: Technician installing precision sensors on machinery.

items.title: Predictive Maintenance Pioneers
items.description: Early adopters of advanced vibration analysis and condition monitoring.

supportingImage.alt: Analysts collaborating over predictive maintenance reports.

items.title: Proven Financial Impact
items.description: Major clients have avoided catastrophic failures and recovered production losses.

supportingImage.alt: Production lines operating steadily after reliability upgrades.

items.title: Safety Record & Culture
items.description: Zero lost-time injuries in years of field operation.

supportingImage.alt: Field crew preparing for cold-weather maintenance work.

services.title: Reliability services built for rotating equipment
services.description: A disciplined mix of diagnostics, monitoring, and field support keeps assets predictable.

items.title: Vibration Analysis
items.description: Deep diagnostics, trend reviews, and acceptance testing for rotating assets.

items.title: Condition Monitoring Programs
items.description: Scalable multi-site programs with dashboards and analyst oversight.

items.title: Advanced Diagnostics
items.description: Motion Amplification, modal studies, ultrasound, and transient analysis for complex problems.

items.title: Troubleshooting & Field Testing
items.description: Rapid deployment teams for emergent issues and performance validation.

items.title: Oil & Gas
items.description: Upstream, midstream, and downstream facilities across Western Canada.

items.title: Mining & Minerals
items.description: Ore processing, concentrators, and materials handling systems.

items.title: Power & Utilities
items.description: Thermal generation, hydro, and transmission infrastructure.

items.title: Forestry & Pulp/Paper
items.description: High-speed machines, fibre lines, and finishing equipment.

items.title: Marine Terminals
items.description: Loading arms, conveyors, and shiploader assets in harsh environments.

items.title: Manufacturing & Heavy Industry
items.description: Complex rotating fleets and bespoke production assets.
